Nineteen Eighty-Four
George Orwell

This edition was timed with a renewed interest in Orwell’s prophetic novel due to the unsavoury rise of Trump and the Alt-Right in the US.

The map featured on the cover was a 1942 prediction of how Hitler might try to annex the U.S. While it’s of course not factually accurate – it’s befitting of the fake-news/newspeak era we’re living in.

“Who controls the past controls the future: who controls the present controls the past.”
